info.title: System
info.description: The System API provides general data on the full eToro System

get.description: The Insights method provides an insight on the trends inside the eToro system

parameters.name: InsightType
parameters.description: What type of insight we wish to see

parameters.name: InstrumentIds
parameters.description: Comma delimited string containing instrument ids which will be explicitly returned

get.description: The daily price change method shows the daily price change of the instruments in the system.

parameters.name: Sort
parameters.description: The order of the response regarding the daily change

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The current page. If omitted the default will be the first page

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of results in each page. If omitted, the page size will default to 20

200.description: The response will contain an array of items which consist of the instrument ID and the daily price change percentage

get.description: The Market Events method returns information on significant market events.

parameters.name: MinDate
parameters.description: Minimum date for events. In case it is omitted it will be 10 days

parameters.name: MaxDate
parameters.description: Maximum date for events. In case it is missing the current timestamp will be used

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The current page. If omitted the default will by 1

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The pagesize. If omitted the default page size will be 10

200.description:
The returned object contains the total number of market events in the requested interval, and an array of events according to the requested paging.

The following describes each item:

EventIdintegerThe unique identifier of the event
EventDescstringDescription of the event type
OccurreddatetimeTimestamp of the event
InstrumentIdintThe instrument ID of the event. A full list of instruments can be obtained from the Metadata/Instruments API
ChangePctnumberThe change percent of the event
IntervalDescstringThe interval which the event refers to
ChangeDescstringChange description, possible values may by percent change, dollar change, pip change
PrevRatenumberThe baseline rate of which the event was calculated
CurrRatenumberThe rate which triggered the event
DirectionDescstringThe direction of a streak event, can be up or down
DurationintegerThe duration in days for a streak event

get.description: The auto-complete method allows you to create an "auto-complete" like widget with both users and instruments in the system

parameters.name: Prefix
parameters.description: The search term you will be executing

parameters.name: InstrumentCount
parameters.description: The number of instruments in the result set

parameters.name: UserCount
parameters.description: The number of users in the result set
